DOC.brief_summary: To evaluate safety , tolerability plasma level single oral dos MK0633 pediatric asthma patient age 6 less 12 year .
DOC.criteria: Patient mild moderate asthma Patient able swallow pill Patient able blood draw Patient require visit hospital emergency room due asthmatic event last 3 month Patient upper respiratory tract infection ( URI ) Patient history stroke Patient consumes 4 caffeinated beverage per day
